mapper.select: SELECT ID, QUIZ_TITLE, QUIZ_DESCRIPTION, QUIZ_CATEGORY, QUIZ_DIFFICULT, QUIZ_LANGUAGE, QUIZ_EXPECTATION, QUIZ_EXP FROM TBL_QUIZ

SELECT TQP.ID, TQP.QUIZ_PERSONAL_IS_SOLVE, TQP.QUIZ_PERSONAL_IS_BOOKMARK, TQP.USER_ID, TQP.QUIZ_ID, TBU.USER_NAME, TBU.USER_NICKNAME, TBU.USER_LEVEL, TBU.USER_EXP, TBU.USER_EMAIL, TBQ.QUIZ_EXP FROM TBL_QUIZ_PERSONAL TQP JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TQP.USER_ID = TBU.ID JOIN TBL_QUIZ TBQ ON TQP.QUIZ_ID = TBQ.ID
